info.name: Phoronix - mark self-reference URLs in text
info.description: Color links in phoronix articles that point to other phoronix-sites, so useful external links stay visible in a jungle of shameless self-promotion :)
info.additionalInfo:
Currently marks links to:
 identi.ca/phoronix
 openbenchmarking.org
 phorogit.com
 phoromatic.com
 phoronix.com
 phoronix-test-suite.com
 twitter.com/phoronix,/#!/michaellarabel

Update 2012-30-01:
 > add phorogit.com URL
Update 2015-04-27
 > match the whole domain, since https is now available and the URI match wasn't sufficient anymore
